title: Multimodal - Research Assistant
description: This project is all about integrating different AI models to handle audio, images, and PDFs in a single chat interface

title: Object Detection
description: This is an object detection project using Raspberry Pi 3 B+ and Raspberry Pi Camera, integrating TensorFlow Lite and OpenCV for real-time image processing.

title: Securing a Small Business Network
description: Highlighted and explained network security and threats to small business networks. Discussed mitigating methods for cyber threats and best cybersecurity practices.

title: Car Game
description: This is simple car game made for the sole purpose of fun and entertainment
